title: Skinny Bean African Mango Extract Drops - Ketogenic, Beauty Support, 2 fl oz
descriptionHtml:
Unlock the power of African mango with Skinny Bean Keto Drops, a natural supplement designed to support your ketogenic lifestyle. These concentrated drops are formulated to boost metabolism, control appetite, balance blood sugar, and enhance the body's ability to convert fat into energy. Unlike many energy-boosting supplements, Skinny Bean Keto Drops maintain proper hydration levels and support overall health, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a holistic approach to weight management and overall well-being.
  • Formulated with African mango extract to help prevent excess energy from turning into fat, allowing you to indulge guilt-free.
  • Designed to drive metabolism, control appetite, and balance blood sugar levels, contributing to efficient fat-to-energy conversion.
  • Maintains proper hydration levels and supports kidney and liver health, unlike many energy-converting supplements.
  • Tailored to complement your ketogenic lifestyle, these drops are designed to elevate your weight loss efforts and promote overall well-being.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 ml
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Proprietary Active-8 & African Mango Complex 200 mg **
African Mango Extract (Irvingia gabonensis) (fruit), Maca Extract (Lepidium meyenii) (root), Astragalus Extract (Membranaceus) (root), Rhodiola Extract (Rhodiola rosea) (root), Pygeum (Prununs africana) (root), L-Arginine Base, L-Glutamine, L-Ornithine HCl, L-Carnitine

**Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Deionized Water, Ethanol, Organic Citrus Extract, Stevia Extract, Xylitol.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
